headline: Does Analyst Caution and Digital Investment Signal a Shift in Schlumberger's Strategy Outlook (SLB)?
summary: In recent days, Schlumberger has faced heightened analyst caution ahead of its latest earnings report, as consensus forecasts point to a year-over-year decline in both earnings per share and revenue, amid broad industry challenges and weaker oil prices. Despite this negative sentiment, the company continues to invest in digital and AI-driven solutions, underscored by its acquisition of Stimline Digital AS to enhance operational efficiency. We'll examine how increased analyst pessimism and...
